subject: Commission payment schedule
description_text:
Hello,

Previously, I sent an email to ask for further information regarding the
commission payment, but I have not yet received a response. I am writing
again to kindly ask for your support in confirming the details when
convenient.

I truly value our current cooperation and sincerely hope you would kindly
review this matter, as it would help me have the necessary budget to
continue working and partnering with you in the long term.

Thank you very much for your time and support. I look forward to hearing
from you when you have a moment.

Kind regards

conversations.body_text: Hi THUMMO,  Regarding the commission, I discussed it with the operations team yesterday and we started organizing the list. The payment is expected to be made around Monday.

That's great, thank you very much.

Vào CN, 11 thg 1, 2026 vào lúc 11:58 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi THUMMO,
>
> Regarding the *commission*, I discussed it with the operations team
> yesterday and we *started organizing the list*.
> The payment is expected to be *made around Monday*.
>
>
>
